NEW YORK (AP) Since Justine Triets Anatomy of a Fall premiered at the Cannes Film Festival where it won the Palme dOr, Sandra Hüller has been dogged by a question: Did she do it?

articles.author: Chris Vognar
articles.title: He Tried to Convert a Remote Tribe to Christianity and Got Killed - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Documentary The Mission explores how John Chau, a young American evangelical, journeyed to North Sentinel Island and ended up shot full of arrows
articles.content: It’s not difficult to scorn John Chau. A 26-year-old evangelical Christian with a taste for outdoor adventure, he undertook a one-man mission in 2018 to North Sentinel Island, an extremely remote and… [+4241 chars]
